function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerabilities in building design and infrastructure that allow for the spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks among workers in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementing engineering controls such as improved ventilation, air filtration, and spatial design to limit the spread of airborne pathogens","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purification devices, and spatial planning tools","People":"Workers and occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building designers, architects, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to international and country-specific COVID-19 regulations and guidelines in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to inadequate regulatory compliance","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and updating of workplace regulations, and implementation of training programs to educate workers on compliance","Technologies":"Regulatory compliance software, training and education platforms","People":"Policymakers, building owners, and workers","Owner":"Government agencies, building owners, and employers"},{"Description":"Inadequate workplace policies and protocols for employee safety and security during COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of employee exposure to COVID-19 and compromised workplace safety","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing comprehensive workplace policies and protocols aligned with health authority guidelines, with input from relevant stakeholders","Technologies":"Employee health monitoring systems, digital health and safety platforms","People":"Employers, business chambers, trade unions, government authorities","Owner":"Employers and organizational leadership"}]}
